detail_desc: Wide T-shirt in striped jersey made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and a rounded hem.

Long dress in softly draping chiffon with a deep V-neck decorated with a pleated flounce that continues over each shoulder and down the back where it turns into narrow ribbons that cross and tie. Seam under the bust, a concealed zip in one side and a flared, pleated skirt. Satin lining.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Sandals made from recycled polyester. Knotted straps and long ties with decorative recycled plastic stones. Embroidered details on the insoles. Rubber soles. Stiletto heels, approx. 10 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy viscose weave with a slightly wider neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved lace top with an opening at the back and button at the back of the neck. Raw scalloped edges at the cuffs and hem.

Small shoulder bag in imitation leather and imitation suede with a narrow shoulder strap and two compartments, one with a zip at the top and one with a concealed magnetic fastener. Lined. Depth 3 cm. Height 13 cm. Width 21 cm.

Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist and zip fly with a button. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Bucket hat in woven fabric with eyelets at the sides and a cotton lining. Width of brim 6 cm.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, padded hood, small, ribbed stand-up collar and two-way zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, a concealed drawstring at the hem and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a round neckline, small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Short-sleeved sports top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of leggings in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a print motif, dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Straight-style jumper in an airy, patterned fine knit with long sleeves.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a turtle neck.
Dressing gown in soft, textured pile with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Metal earrings in various designs. Size 1 cm-6 cm.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist with a tasselled drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastic at the hems.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with an all-over print. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Microfibre leggings with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Sports hoodie in sturdy jersey with a print motif, high collar and mesh-lined, drawstring hood. Mesh-lined kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves with seams, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pull-on jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a loose fit with an elasticated drawstring waist. Fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket, and elasticated hems.

Bra top in soft fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated ribbing at the hem. No fasteners.
Jacket in a nylon weave with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip. Zipped side pockets, one inner pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in a checked cotton weave with a gathered yoke, buttons at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounced trim, and flared skirt. Unlined.
Long parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge, small stand-up collar and zip down the front. Drawstring at the waist and elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Dungaree shorts in a patterned crêpe weave with a double-layered front and open back. Shoulder straps with adjustable fasteners, a tie belt at the waist and concealed zip at the back.
Short-sleeved V-neck top in softly draping airy jersey with a slight sheen.
Imitation suede mules with open toes, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels, 7 cm.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Vest top in soft, ribbed jersey with a flounce around the neckline that continues over the shoulders.
Leggings in soft, denim-look jersey made from an organic cotton blend with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Cold shoulder dress in sturdy jersey with a flounce at the top, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with an opening and press-studs at one side and press-studs at the crotch.

Calf-length dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a small stand-up collar and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with smocking and a narrow frill trim at the hems. Two slits at the front. Unlined.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Swim top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif on the front, stand-up collar and raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a bow on top.
Fully lined bikini top with wide shoulder straps and a wide elasticated hem. No fasteners.
High-waisted shorts in a linen and cotton weave with wide elastication and a frill trim at the waist and pockets in the side seams.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a small embroidered detail at the top, long raglan sleeves and contrasting colour panels at the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leather sandals with an adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and soles.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets with a flap.

Top in a jacquard weave with an opening and narrow ties at the back of the neck. Elbow-length, raglan puff sleeves with narrow, concealed elastication, a seam at the waist with a discreet drawstring, and a flared peplum. Lined.
Top in soft jersey with 3/4-length sleeves with drawstrings. Gathers in the side seams for optimum fit.
Metal ear cuffs and earrings in various designs. Six ear cuffs, one pair of earrings and two single earrings. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Short, fitted jersey skirt with an elasticated waist and gathered seam at the front.
Treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Imitation suede mules with open toes, satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm. Covered block heel 11 cm.
Fully-fashioned trainers with rubber details, elasticated lacing and loops front and back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can be tied in various ways and worn as a sarong around the hips, a beach dress, a wrapover top or a turban. Size 130x150 cm.
Single-breasted coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
5-pocket, low-rise, skinny-fit jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and super-skinny legs.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Wedge-heel sandals with an ankle-height shaft, open section at the back, ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle and a strap over the foot. Heels and insoles covered in braided jute. Rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm, heel approx. 9 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Jacquard-knit jumper in soft cotton with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Relaxed, straight fit with a gathered seam and flared flounce at the hem.
Calf-length dress in airy satin with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets, a drawstring at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with gathers at the top and lace sections on the shoulders.
Shirt in a softly draping viscose and silk blend with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves, buttoned cuffs and short slits in the sides.
Short V-neck dress in jersey with a heavy drape. 3/4-length sleeves, concealed pockets in the side seams and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt.
Chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long raglan sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist and overlocked hems.

Shirt in a premium cotton weave with a grandad collar with a tab at the front, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Draped stand-up collar with a roll edge, a seam under the bust with detachable ties, gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Jeggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and a small embroidery detail at the hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Strappy top in microfibre with adjustable shoulder straps and a lace-trimmed V-neck. The polyamide content of the top is partly recycled.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Trousers in a crêpe weave with a low waist, low crotch and zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, gently flared legs with sewn-in pleats.
